Label.en: By making their women (Caryatides) support the rooves of their buildings for eternity!
Label.fr: By making their women (Caryatides) support the rooves of their buildings for eternity!
Label.es: By making their women (Caryatides) support the rooves of their buildings for eternity!

Label.en: And that’s how the statues get their name!
Label.fr: And that’s how the statues get their name!
Label.es: And that’s how the statues get their name!

Label.en: This particular Caryatid supported the Erechtheion, on the Acropolis in Athens
Label.fr: This particular Caryatid supported the Erechtheion, on the Acropolis in Athens
Label.es: This particular Caryatid supported the Erechtheion, on the Acropolis in Athens

Label.en: She had 5 sisters to help her, and those are held in the Acropolis Museum
Label.fr: She had 5 sisters to help her, and those are held in the Acropolis Museum
Label.es: She had 5 sisters to help her, and those are held in the Acropolis Museum

Label.en: Well, the Caryatids all have very thick, blocky hair…
Label.fr: Well, the Caryatids all have very thick, blocky hair…
Label.es: Well, the Caryatids all have very thick, blocky hair…

Label.en: not because that was the fashion…
Label.fr: not because that was the fashion…
Label.es: not because that was the fashion…

Label.en: But because it’s vital for making them actually able to support the temple!
Label.fr: But because it’s vital for making them actually able to support the temple!
Label.es: But because it’s vital for making them actually able to support the temple!

Label.en: Talk about a bad hair day!
Label.fr: Talk about a bad hair day!
Label.es: Talk about a bad hair day!
